panels.description: CPU usage as a percentage during the interval.

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpu_usage_average")  / 100 FROM "virtualmachine" WHERE "name" =~ /^$vmname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

panels.title: CPU Usage %

panels.description: Memory usage as percentage of total configured or available memory.
panels.title: Memory Usage %

panels.description: Rate at which memory is swapped from disk into active memory during the interval.
panels.title: Memory Swap In Rate

panels.description: Rate at which memory is being swapped from active memory to disk during the current interval.
panels.title: Memory Swap Out Rate

panels.description: Amount of machine memory used by the VMkernel to run the virtual machine.
panels.title: Memory Overhead

panels.description: Percent of time the virtual machine is unable to run because it is contending for access to the physical CPU(s).
panels.title: CPU Ready %

panels.description: Average amount of time for a read operation from the virtual disk. Total latency = kernel latency + device latency.
panels.title: Disk Read Latency

panels.description: The average time a write to the virtual disk takes
panels.title: Disk Write Latency

panels.description: Average number of read commands issued per second to the virtual disk during the collection interval
panels.title: Disk Read IOPS

panels.description: Average number of write commands issued per second to the virtual disk during the collection interval
panels.title: Disk Write IOPS

panels.description: Rate of reading data from the virtual disk
panels.title: Disk Read Throughput

panels.description: Rate of writing data to the virtual disk

targets.query: SELECT SUM("virtualdisk_numberwriteaveraged_average")  FROM "virtualdisk" WHERE "name" =~ /^$vmname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk Write Throughput

panels.description: Average number of outstanding read requests to the virtual disk during the collection interval

targets.query: SELECT SUM("virtualdisk_numberwriteaveraged_average")  FROM "virtualdisk" WHERE "name" =~ /^$vmname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk Read Outstanding I/O

panels.description: Average number of outstanding write requests to the virtual disk during the collection interval.

targets.query: SELECT SUM("virtualdisk_numberwriteaveraged_average")  FROM "virtualdisk" WHERE "name" =~ /^$vmname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk Write Outstanding I/O

panels.description: Average rate at which data was received during the interval
panels.title: Network Receive Rate (RX)

panels.description: Average rate at which data was transmitted during the interval
panels.title: Network Transmit Rate (TX)

list.label: Virtual Machine
list.name: vmname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "virtualmachine" WITH KEY = "name" where "host" =~ /vcenter01/
